p: Plant steroids are a diverse group of secondary metabolites. Up to now, phytochemical studies have afforded six steroids from the Lagochilus genus, which sitosteryl acetate ( 122), stigmasteryl acetate ( 124), lupeol ( 126) from L. cabulicus [ 23, 36] ( Table 3, Figure S6). L. gypsaceus afforded daucosterol ( 125) and β-sitosterol ( 121) [ 40]. β-Sitosterol ( 121), stigmasterol ( 123), and daucosterol ( 125) were isolated from L. inebrians [ 50]. β-Sitosterol ( 121) was identified in L. lanatonodus and L. pubescens [ 12, 27, 30, 51, 60, 61].
